main event: A witness reported sighting a UFO that appeared to be an oval-shaped craft about 30 to 50 feet in diameter in Westford, Massachusetts on September 6, 1964.
interesting points: The craft moved rapidly and silently across the sky, making a 90 degree turn and hovering briefly,The objects were observed through binoculars,The witness speculated it could have been a government experimental craft,The sighting lasted for 10 to 15 minutes,The objects were not visible to the naked eye but revealed through binocular observations.
sighted object: oval-shaped craft, approximately 30 to 50 feet in diameter
witness description: a man and his wife, along with their son age 12.
